metadata.description: Privacy & Transparency - Privacy protection, data handling - MAPPED

controls.Name: PT-1-description - Policy and Procedures

details: Develop and document privacy and transparency policy and procedures
Establish privacy and transparency roles and responsibilities
Define privacy and transparency processes and workflows
Create privacy and transparency documentation and templates
Establish policy review and update processes

controls.notes: AWS functions support policy and procedures through privacy protection, data handling, and compliance monitoring capabilities

controls.Name: PT-2-description - Authority to Process Personally Identifiable Information
controls.control_title: Authority to Process Personally Identifiable Information

details: Determine and document authority for PII processing
Restrict PII processing to authorized purposes only
Implement data tagging for authorized processing
Monitor and audit PII processing activities

new_functions_suggested.description: Automated monitoring of privacy compliance and PII processing
new_functions_suggested.purpose: Enhanced privacy compliance monitoring for PT-1 and PT-2 compliance

new_functions_suggested.description: Automated monitoring of privacy policy and procedure compliance
new_functions_suggested.purpose: Enhanced policy monitoring for PT-1 compliance

new_functions_suggested.description: Comprehensive logging of PII processing activities
